content: concurrent driver upgrade.  A function on the SE allows you or your IBM SSR to define the concurrent driver upgrade sync point to be used for an CDM.  The ability to concurrently install and activate a driver can eliminate or reduce a planned outage.  IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ introduce Concurrent Driver Upgrade (CDU) cloning support to other CPCs for CDU preinstallation and activation.  Concurrent crossover from Driver level N to Driver level N+1, then to Driver level N+2, must be done serially. No composite moves are allowed.  Disruptive upgrades are permitted at any time, and allow for a composite upgrade (Driver N to Driver N+2). Reserved storage: If you plan to use the EDA function with z/OS LPARs, set up reserved storage and an RSU value. Use the RSU value to specify the number of storage units that are to be kept free of long-term fixed storage allocations. This configuration allows for storage elements to be varied offline. 388 IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ Technical
